text:
I was really impressed with the warm service here, but most importantly the excellent and professional museum quality preservation of my trophy barracuda skull I caught in Singapore waters.

They did a fantastic job and I couldn’t ask for better!

Such a beautiful space and the Butterfly frame workshop was really unique, relaxing, and fun. Both the owner and staff of the studio were also really friendly and nice. 10/10 would recommend a visit! Thank you so much for honouring wildlife, I really admire what you guys do!
We found out about this workshop a couple of days ago and we’ve always wanted to attend one. It was a fun experience building up my butterfly frame from scratch. Would 100% recommend!!

The butterfly workshop was an anmazing and eye-opening experience. A fun activity to do with friends or a partner and learn more about the local wildlife and taxidermy. 10/10 would recommend and would definitely come back for more workshops!

Did the bird skeleton articulation workshop. They give free plants to decorate ur dome as well. Also Got to tour around the place and see their many specimens and they are knowledgable in their crafts.
